website_summaries.verdict: Provides fairly clear guidance for businesses from LLCs to S corporations, but can have some compatibility issues with printers.
pros: Guides users through tricky tax matters
Useful information on activities such as starting a new business, buying a house
cons: Some state exemptions and rules missing from non-updated software
Business tax prep interface isn’t intuitive

website_summaries.verdict: Provides fairly clear guidance for individuals with complex tax situations, and for businesses from LLCs to S corporations, but can have some compatibility issues with printers.
pros: Quickly installs and updates with few or no problems
Guides filers through tricky tax matters like starting a new business, buying a home and more
cons: Some state exemptions and rules may be missing from non-updated software
Business tax prep interface isn’t as intuitive as the personal tax prep software
Importing data from other financial software may be problematic

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE BLOCK ADMITS DEFECTS IN PROGRAM
customer_reviews.text: Used this product since it's inception...over 10 years. Last year NONE of the discs or programs worked properly. Thought I would give them one more shot. Even MORE issues installing on Windows 10, which I NEVER, ever had an issue with. Tech support is clueless and though they have sent me links to reinstall and try again, NOTHING is working and the escalation team at Block has NEVER contacted me in over a week. Use a competitors software. Block changed over night and I highly recommend you NOT use this or any of their products. I am an advanced computer user, know my computer cold. This is just plain ridiculous. Talked to mgmt. Admits issues with Home and Business version.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Description wrong. Does not run on Mac OS.
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that even though this product states it is for PC/MAC...it will not run on Mac OS as verified directly with H&R Block product support. The description is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using H&R Block software for over a decade and find it easy to use. I'm a former accountant and would say that the corporate returns are not nearly as user friendly and are above the average person's pay grade. However, if you are buying this because you have rental property or a reasonably uncomplicated Sched C, it walks you through it very well.
customer_reviews.author: V. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Each year it continues to exhibit poor layout and lack of available forms
customer_reviews.text: We do non-profit reporting using IRS 990 and 990EZ schedules - the 2019 software and on line access to H&R Block continue to be problematic. For example the actual 990 and 990EZ continue to be "Not Available. Some of the associated Schedules are also "Not Available." If you use their software you have to improvise to complete your reporting. In our case we had to send out 1099MIC documents by now and we had to go in and find a way to use their 1099MISC from other sources. Last year (2018) we had to hand-write in sections that their software did not fill in from the data section from within it was entered.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pouliot

customer_reviews.title: Part of this works on Win 7, the other part does not
customer_reviews.text: 1 star because product is listed as working on Windows 7, and it does not. Specifically, there are two separate programs to this product: The personal tax filling software and the business software. The personal tax filing software appears to work on windows 7. The business tax filing software DOES NOT work on windows 7. Product: I've been using this for years and it typically does what it's supposed to do. Customer Support: Today's experience was AWFUL. First support person transfers me to upper level support. I wait on phone for 1.5 hours just to have them tell me product doesn't work on windows 7. WHY DIDN'T FIRST PERSON ON PHONE TELL ME THIS???
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Working Area of Software - Not Large enough
customer_reviews.text: The work area is down at the bottom and we're prompted to "open whole form" often. It also presumes that you need this or that form and sends you to it. When you do the final review it keeps telling you "there's an error, you didn't complete this form" even though the instructions told you that, under our situation, that form wasn't needed. And it continuously reminded us that we needed to fill out the forms for e-filing although we ARE NOT e-filing. will I order again? Probably. It isn't that much worse than Turbo Tax and it's a bunch cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: D. V. Gerschutz

customer_reviews.title: Business software is junk.
customer_reviews.text: Used this software for years. The business part of the software has always been a little clunkier than the personal software but this year it has been horrendous. Whenever I save a return the program gets a "the program has encountered and unknown error and has to close" the next time I open it. The only way I can "save" anything is to use the "Backup Return" feature which "exports" the return. I can then "import" the return the next time I open the software. The personal software works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: My 10th Year
customer_reviews.text: This s my 10th year on the product - and I have a relatively complex set of returns and am a CPA. This isn't the world's easiest set to use - though it isn't bad at the individual level. At the business level, the forms are all there, but the interview requires some decent tax knowledge to work through. Having said that, the cost can't be beat, it supports e-filing, and I will be continuing with the full set next year.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Barton

customer_reviews.title: Move from TAX ACT to H&R
customer_reviews.text: Price is right for business (1065-LLC,1120S & 1120) and personal (1040). I select a hard copy since most comments noted they don't get the business part. One difficulty is when time for e-file. It gives us error "to print and sign cover sheet 8435-PE". So we did and scanned the cover sheet but there is NO instruction how to attach the cover sheet to my 1065. Took me about one hour to google and click every button. It was on the UPPER TAB under E-FILE. We should do just like other countries, since IRS already know what we did - why not send us the paperwork and see if we agree or disagree!
customer_reviews.author: studfinder

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your experience
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one because the TurboTax business program, which I usually use, does not include estates and trusts. This one does. However, because ours is a very simple trust, I found that going to the IRS site and downloading the forms I needed, then filling them out, was a lot simpler and faster than going through the program, which was obviously designed for things my vocabulary doesn't include!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Y. Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Make several backups before importing prior year data.
customer_reviews.text: Business program bombed out and erased data from prior year's return when attempting to import. Have to rebuild data base for partnership. There is no trace of that return on the hard drive. This is a major deal. Thank God that I left myself a few weeks to rebuild. Would not even bother with tech support, based on prior experience, they are ineffectual.
customer_reviews.author: 12nick

customer_reviews.title: Support problems
customer_reviews.text: The product did not load on the computer I then called technical support and was on hold for 25 minutes. No one came on the line but then I got the survey of how the phone call went. Guess what my response was?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: FOR EXTREME PROFESSIONAL ACCOUNTANTS NOT BOOKKEEPERS
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions like the online H&R Block. The download & disc are for extreme Professional ONLY, If you have QuickBooks experience, are familiar with older Accounting systems, know which forms go with each tax document, then go ahead and order, otherwise, stay clear! You will waste hours of frustration and end up back online paying the fees to H&R Block Online and returning this disc or download..what a waste of time and loss of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teammom

customer_reviews.title: The HR Business Software does not work
customer_reviews.text: The HR Block Premium software seems to work fine. The Business software does not. I have worked with their support multiple times and loaded the Business application multiple times from different sources. Seems when you go to run the UPDATE function (which you have to do to get the forms), the application will no longer work. One of the support personnel mentioned Windows 10 as the problem but really? Windows 10 has been out for some time now.
customer_reviews.author: Flsp18

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't transfer tax files from TurboTax
customer_reviews.text: I Dont know why but the .txf would not be able to get uploaded onto the tax software and that's a shame. Turbo tax is still better despite being more expensive. The UI is a little dated, it looks like something from the 2000's but it's not too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Underground Tech

customer_reviews.title: Worse Program Ever
customer_reviews.text: Just now getting around to using it for 2019 taxes. I've never seen anything more user "unfriendly" and complicated. It was easier for me to download the forms and complete them by hand with the federal instruction guide. It's too late for me to return so the best place to keep this product is in my memory, so I never purchase it again, and in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: jlc49

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself some $$ and much frustration
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU HAVE 1099-MISC INCOME!!!! After 3-4 hours of frustration and absolutely no help from the help section, i learned that H + R Block has a separate program ($100 +) for self-employed or small business owners. It is cheaper and way less frustrating to hire someone to do your taxes.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Atty

customer_reviews.title: Tech support for the Business software was non existent.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the HR block home and business for over 10 years. The Business software would not load on my computer for 2019 tax year. I needed to complete partnership return before doing my individual return. I was using windows 10. I called customer service for HR block and after 4 hours had to give up because no one was available to help me solve the issue with the Business software not loading. I purchased Turbo Tax Business software for the first time and it performed as expected completing my partnership return for 2019. As a long time customer of HR Block software, I was very disappointed with the lack of attention given by their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning. Could make a calc error.
customer_reviews.text: Warning. This product made a big mistake. The IRS had to fix. Doesn't seem to ask the right questions. I have to keep going to the forum searching find out where to put things and then close it and go back to the conversation mode. I'm switching next year.
customer_reviews.author: Fumbles

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the H&R Block software since 2014, so I’m not new to installing the program. I installed and uninstalled this CD several times, but I couldn’t get the Business portion of the program to open. I spent 2 hours on the phone with H&R Block technical support and they told me that the file in the CD was corrupted. I’m hoping I can get a refund even though it says nonrefundable!
customer_reviews.author: REY S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for non accountants!
customer_reviews.text: Lack of explanations. some forms not populated with data unless printed, worksheets and 'jump to' not always functional. Program auto changes answers, seemingly at random. Extra blank forms added to return or forms with only 0's on lines. "Sch D"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst software I have ever used would love to get my money back on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this software it is not worth anything and I downloaded the forms I needed from the I.R.S. site and then used Adobe Reader which let me fill in the entire form without any problem. I will never purchase another product from H&R Block because this was really junk! I paid a lot of money for software that is buggy and asking for help was a complete joke with their customer service. Jim Hill
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hill

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Works and you can upload a pdf file of previous years return so you can switch without re-entering data.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Me  off!
customer_reviews.text: Item is fine. But Amazon ratings on my purchases are to warn you. They lie with splash ads for free debit card. Then rip you off. That’s fraud!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: won't load
customer_reviews.text: the disk is not spinning and the box just looks like it's filling but then spins. been an hour now and the second time I tried to load it. it just won't load...
customer_reviews.author: Master of none

customer_reviews.title: Not for business, only personal
customer_reviews.text: The website description led me to believe that I can do my llc tax prep with this software. But that is not true. It is exclusive for preparing the Federal and state, as marked on the package. I didn't use the features, so can't review for those.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional bargain
customer_reviews.text: I use this software every year and the bargain price I got this year was exceptional. Friends and family thought I was getting a bogus or fake but it is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: great program
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product and recommend it to anyone and everyone. So easy to install and work through the whole tax program
customer_reviews.author: Amber Kerins

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought H&R Block Small Business Desktop Edition and I'm sorry I wasted my money. Won't even install and and no error message or any indication why it hangs. Don't waste your time, there's better programs out there.
customer_reviews.author: James Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Misleading headline - DO NOT BUY if you have an S-corp
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product could handle S-corp taxes - I was massively wrong. I asked for a refund and was only refunded $4.50. What a ripoff!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yu

customer_reviews.title: I've use them for years and have always been satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using H&R Block software to do my taxes for many years. It steps you through everything you need and seldom do I have questions. When I do, I've always had a good experience getting a response and my question answered.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Would not run on my Windows 7
customer_reviews.text: Would not run on my Windows 7, despite contrary and conflicting information on Amazon product page.
customer_reviews.author: Hooter96158

customer_reviews.title: Business software stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought software in December 2019. Had most input done, and software worked. Went to finalize return today and the business software will not run. The provided CD does not repair or reinstall the business software. It appeRs to install the individual software, but I bought this to prepare a Trust return. Very disappointed, as I have been using this software quite a while, without this type of issue.
customer_reviews.author: New2Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Good software and simple to use but super annoying hidden fees
customer_reviews.text: Software worked good and helped me file but unlike everything I researched - there was not one but two hidden fees to actually file.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Hill

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: Hidden fees, terrible support, stick with turbo tax or tax Slayer. I will never buy another HR block product again!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: H&R meets my needs for small business
customer_reviews.text: Typical tax software. Prefer H&R over Turbo Tax for small business tax needs. Cheaper. Also interfaces with Turbo Tax when helping others who used Turbo Tax for past years.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carr

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this tax software for 7 years. It was a little hard at first, but now its a breeze !!!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond T Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk 2019 tax software
customer_reviews.text: I have been using H&R Block business for years. For this 2019 tax year, program suddenly frozen and show "The program has encountered and unexpected error and needs to close" message. I called H&R tech support 4 times, waited for nearly an hour each and every time and I got dropped off all 4 times after I was asked some questions. Terrible experience and terrible support.
customer_reviews.author: CANARY PAYMENT SERVICES

customer_reviews.title: Satisified as always
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this software for over 10 years! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Boeing747

customer_reviews.title: Same Year after Year
customer_reviews.text: Works smoothly from year to year. A bit pricey for most consumers, but a good deal for a tax preparer. Seamlessly pulls in the necessary prior year data.
customer_reviews.author: MJBR

customer_reviews.title: H&R BLOCK PREMIUM & BUSINESS
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. You put in the work, and you have to have a decent idea what you are doing. But if you do and have those, it is much less expensive than an accountant. Plus there is the satisfaction of doing it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Better than an accountant
customer_reviews.text: I buy it every year and intend to continue doing so. Makes my tax preparation a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Beach Native

customer_reviews.title: Business Software is Glitchy/Customer service is poor
customer_reviews.text: Business software did not work, had to do a lot of troubleshooting. Have spent approximately 8 hours on the phone dealing with software issues with the business software. The customer service has not been good either. Transferred without being told that I am going to be transferred and multiple times promised call backs that never happened.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Friebel

customer_reviews.title: Stuck during installation
customer_reviews.text: Won't install so I'm not sure how this software performs.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Have being using H&R tax software for years.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and easy to use. walks you through every step of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J Reese

customer_reviews.title: Excellent software to do Individual And Business Federal and State taxes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent software to do Individual And Business Federal and State taxes.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Have used it for years
customer_reviews.text: A good tax program that I have used since before it was H&R.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be used for S or C Corporations
customer_reviews.text: Although the description reflects that you can prepare 1120 returns, it is not included in the program. This is false advertising!!
customer_reviews.author: Al Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: WON'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: IT WILL NOT LOAD. HAVE 2 COMPUTERS AND WILL LOAD ON EITHER ONE. I DON'T WANT TO SEND IT BACK I WANT IT TO WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Windows 7
customer_reviews.text: Business tax program does NOT work with Windows 7 eventhough in the ad it's stated as such.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: Bad Program
customer_reviews.text: It did not work like mine have in the past. It just had issues every time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A. Satory

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Description
customer_reviews.text: States that 1120 S is included. IT IS NOT. Waste of money and time for me.
customer_reviews.author: JOGINDER SINGH

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Sucks
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT GET THIS SOFTWARE.....never get any support and lot of glitches
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Where's the activation code?
customer_reviews.text: The activation code on the inserted card is blank and cannot be installed without the code.
customer_reviews.author: Paula T.

product_meta.title: H&R Block Tax Software Premium & Business 2019 with 4% Refund Bonus Offer [PC Disc]
product_meta.description: Guidance for corporate, partnership, and payroll business returns. The complete personal and business tax return solution. Step-by-step interviews guide you through your personal and business tax situation.
feature_bullets: Five free federal e-files and unlimited federal preparation and printing
One state program download included - a $39.95 value
Step-by-step Q&A and guidance on all available credits and deductions

Get guidance for, prepare and file corporate and S corporation tax returns (Forms 1120, 1120S), partnership and LLC tax returns (Form 1065), estate and trust tax returns (Form 1041), nonprofit tax returns (Form 990)
Quickly import your W-2, 1099, 1098, last year's personal tax return
Free live product help via chat - or get tax help from a tax expert for a fee
Help center has more than 13,000 articles, frequently asked questions, and tips in case you get stuck while preparing your taxes
Must allocate all or a portion of Federal refund to Amazon.com Gift Card to receive 4% Refund Bonus

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
